title: Pearl iZUMi introduces Gravel Gaiters! Plus new Fall 2021 pieces for road & MTB
content:
It’s hard to think about dropping temperatures when summer is still in full swing, but we all know cooler rides are still tons of fun… if you have the right clothing to ride in! Pearl iZUMi has announced their 2021 Fall clothing line, which is all about breathability and weather protection for tackling the roads […]

The post Pearl iZUMi introduces Gravel Gaiters! Plus new Fall 2021 pieces for road & MTB appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
